text: Z'EV (born Stefan Joel Weisser, February 8, 1951 â€“ December 16, 2017) was an American poet, percussionist, and sound artist. He was known for creating his own percussion sounds out of industrial materials for many of record labels. He was called a pioneer of industrial music. Z'EV was critically injured in the Cimarron train derailment which took place near Dodge City, Kansas on March 14, 2016. Since the accident he suffered from many health problems and died on December 16, 2017 of sepsis at the age of 66. == Related pages == *List of poets from North America ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from sepsis Category:American poets Category:Musicians from Los Angeles Category:Writers from Los Angeles
title: Z'EV
